title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Wii Sports where Sales in million units is 82.88.
The lowest category is found at Wii Party where Sales in million units is 9.34.
The highest value at Wii Sports is almost 8.87 times larger than the minimum value of Wii Party.
The highest value at Wii Sports is almost 8.87 times larger than the minimum value of Wii Party.
The difference between the max Month Wii Sports and min Month Wii Party is 73.53999999999999.
